\n< Serena >Hmm... I see. Alright, let's give it a try.

\n< Serena >Honestly, I'm a little interested. My father and
sister never allowed me to spend time on
household chores other than studying...
\n< Gekuran >Boohee!
終了
I'm not going

\n< Serena >I apologize, but I'm busy right now.
Maybe later.
\n< Gekuran >Boohee...
終了

\n< Serena >Lord Gekuran, I would like to request an
explanation for this request.
討伐依頼
\n< Gekuran >It's a request to subjugate goblins, huh.

\n< Gekuran >Hehehe. There's a forest just south of the
town, you know. If you go in and
immediately head west, there's a cave
along the river. That's where they've
made their nest, you see.

\n< Gekuran >This time's request is to exterminate every
single goblin inside their nest, you
know. Buhiihi.

\n< Gekuran >Just be careful, the ones we need to
exterminate are only the ones inside the
nest, so watch out. Buhiihi.

\n< Gekuran >Goblins are weak monsters, but they can cause
terrible things to happen to humans...
especially to girls, so be careful.
\n< Gekuran >Buhiihi.
\n< Gekuran >It's a request to subjugate ropers, huh.

\n< Gekuran >They're disgusting monsters, those idetochos.
Buhii. It's a request to exterminate
them, you know.

\n< Gekuran >If you continue south through the forest,
you'll eventually reach the breeding
ground of the ropers, so it's best to
hunt them there. Buhiihi.

\n< Gekuran >The tentacle attacks are really heavy and
fast, so be careful. They have enough
power to crush an iron helmet in one
hit, you know.

\n< Gekuran >Ropers are monsters that do terrible things to
human girls, so be careful and fight
while being prepared to escape at any
time.
\n< Gekuran >Buhii.
\n< Gekuran >It's a request to subjugate the Wargs, huh.

\n< Gekuran >It's a big wolf-like monster that claims the
eastern side of the deep mountains in
the east.

\n< Gekuran >It might be troublesome if you get
surrounded since they're fast and there
are many of them.

\n< Gekuran >The reason why there are so many of them is
because for some reason, they always
give birth to triplets when they get
pregnant.

\n< Gekuran >If you get impregnated, it'll be a big
problem, you know. Wargs give birth to
three of their children at once, so be
careful... buhii.

\n< Gekuran >It seems like the sewer slimes have grown
too much. The city is requesting their
extermination, you know. Buhii.

\n< Gekuran >It seems that slashing or hitting the
grown slimes doesn't have much effect,
you know. Buhii.

\n< Gekuran >Since they won't flinch from normal attacks,
it's better to focus on magic attacks
when fighting. Buhii buhii.

\n< Gekuran >On the way, I think there are also small
slimes, buhii. But those little ones
don't need to be exterminated, so yeah.

\n< Gekuran >Hibu~. Slimes are like janitors for trash, you
know. It's troublesome if they grow too
much, but it's also troublesome if they
disappear, you know.

\n< Gekuran >Of course, that's for our convenience.
Slimes attack us normally, so be sure to
be cautious. Buhii.

\n< Gekuran >It's terrible if you get caught by a slime,
you know. They can do whatever they want
inside your body, so be careful, okay?
Buhii buhii.

\n< Gekuran >Especially, um... pregnant women are... in a way,
very dangerous... buhii...

\n< Gekuran >It's like having their favorite food inside
your belly... buhii...
\n< Gekuran >Buhii... Be careful not to lose, okay?
\n< Gekuran >It's a request to subjugate the orcs, huh.

\n< Gekuran >If you go east at the crossroads, there's
a small hill. It seems like there's a
herd in that forest over there. Buhii.

\n< Gekuran >Orcs are strong, so they're not very
popular... They tend to be left
unchecked, you know. Buhii buhii.

\n< Gekuran >It's especially dangerous for girls...
buhii.
\n< Serena >What do you mean by especially dangerous?

\n< Gekuran >I don't think Serena-chan would
understand even if I told her, but well,
it's like being turned into a slave.
Buhii buhii.

\n< Gekuran >It's because you'll experience a lot of pain
and suffering... So make sure you don't
lose, okay? Buhiihi~
\n< Serena >.......
\n< Gekuran >It's a request to subjugate the pigmen, huh.

\n< Gekuran >Pig monsters. A little familiar, huh? No,
no, there's no sense of familiarity at
all. They're monsters, after all. Buhii.

\n< Gekuran >It seems like this time they're nesting in
the cave on the east side of the
southern forest. Buhii buhii.

\n< Gekuran >Pigmen have poor eyesight, but they'll
surprise you with how accurately they
counterattack. Buhii.

\n< Gekuran >Just keeping a little distance won't work,
buhii buhii. They'll accurately find us
and attack. Moreover, they charge at us
like a mass of muscles, so defense won't
work either, you know.

\n< Gekuran >That's why when attacking, you must not get
too close. Buhiihi~ Take a step... no,
three steps back and attack at the edge
of your range, I think.

\n< Gekuran >Alternatively, you could bring a lot of recovery items
and fight while chugging them down.
Buhii buhii.

\n< Gekuran >If you get caught by the pigmen, it's like
being in hell, you know. So please be
careful. Buhii~

\n< Gekuran >Stallion, huh... I won't say anything bad, but
it's better to stay away from that.
Buhii~

\n< Gekuran >It's a monster that looks like a horse
standing up... It's incredibly big. And
strong... Scary. Buhii.

\n< Gekuran >I, well, I actually like horses... but
because of that, this one feels really
twisted and grotesque to me...

\n< Gekuran >Their combat power is off the charts. They
don't flinch from any attack and keep
attacking continuously. Buhiihi~.

\n< Gekuran >They have endless stamina... Are you really
going to accept the request? I think it
would be better to save money through
other jobs... Buhii.

\n< Gekuran >A-Also, Stallions have really big cocks.
They're almost the size of logs. Buhii.

\n< Gekuran >They thrust it in with the monster's
muscular strength... and the girls who
get caught... they die.

\n< Gekuran >You don't want to die in such a tragic way,
right? Let's not do it... If you really
insist on doing it, then before that,
how about you and I...
\n< Gekuran >Buhii...

\n< Gekuran >It's a request from the city, huh. They want
you to take care of the thugs. The city
police told them to do it, but those
guys don't work, you know. Buhii~.

\n< Gekuran >It seems like they're illegally occupying
an abandoned house in the city dungeon.
I think you'll understand as soon as you
go there.

\n< Gekuran >I think Serena-chan is more than capable
of defeating them, but since there are
multiple opponents, let's not let our
guard down, okay?

\n< Gekuran >It's a request from the city, huh. They want
you to take care of the thugs. The city
police told them to do it, but those
guys don't work, you know. Buhii~.

\n< Gekuran >There's a gathering place like a hangout spot
on the north side of the slums, so I
think you'll understand as soon as you
go there.

\n< Gekuran >I think Serena-chan is more than capable
of defeating them, but since there are
multiple opponents, let's not let our
guard down, okay?

\n< Gekuran >It's a request from the city, huh. They want
you to take care of the thugs. The city
police told them to do it, but those
guys don't work, you know. Buhii~.

\n< Gekuran >It seems like they're illegally occupying

I think you'll understand as soon as you

\n< Gekuran >I think Serena-chan is more than capable
of defeating them, but since there are
multiple opponents, let's not let our
guard down, okay?

\n< Gekuran >It's a request from the city, huh. They want
you to take care of the thugs. The city

guys don't work, you know. Buhii~.

\n< Gekuran >There's a gathering place like a hangout spot
on the north side of the slums, so I
think you'll understand as soon as you
go there.

\n< Gekuran >I think Serena-chan is more than capable
of defeating them, but since there are
multiple opponents, let's not let our
guard down, okay?
\n< Gekuran >Transporting goods. It's an errand, huh?

\n< Gekuran >Shirley-chan is the blonde girl who always sits at
the table in the corner. Once you
receive the package, please take it to
the tool shop in the back of the slums.

\n< Gekuran >It seems like Shirley-chan was captured
for a few days after failing to defeat
the goblins. After being rescued, she
took a break for a while and recently
returned.

\n< Gekuran >What happened while you were being held
captive, what happened while you were
resting, and what are you going to give
to the tool shop in the slums? I
understand everything... buhuhu.
討伐依頼

\n< Gekuran >The goblins are in a cave on the west side
of the southern forest, so it's best to
defeat them there.

\n< Gekuran >There's a forest on the north side of the
mountains to the east, so go there and
defeat the guys who are there.

\n< Gekuran >Ropers are densely populated further south in
the southern forest.

\n< Gekuran >Wargs live by climbing the eastern mountains
and going to the east from there.

\n< Gekuran >It's best to head towards the sewer from the
entrance of the city dungeon located on
the east side of the town.

\n< Gekuran >It's better to avoid losing to the Big Slime
while pregnant, as it would result in
something horrifying.

\n< Gekuran >I think if you go to the southern forest
and take the road on the east side,
there's a cave there, so if you go
deeper inside, you should be able to
meet them.

\n< Gekuran >It seems like you can meet the Stallions
by climbing the eastern mountains and
going further east to reach the mountain
top.
民間依頼

\n< Gekuran >It seems like the thugs are in the
direction of the city dungeon. Be

\n< Gekuran >It seems like the thugs are in the

okay?

\n< Gekuran >It seems like the thugs are in the

okay?

\n< Gekuran >The back of the slums is even more lawless
than here. Even if you get attacked, no
one will come to help you, so be
careful, okay?

\n< Gekuran >*sniffle* *sniffle*, Serena-chan... Is something
wrong?

\n< Serena >...It's not something Gekuran-sama needs to
worry about.
\n< Gekuran >I-I see...
終了
ストーリー　物資護衛依頼
\n< Gekuran >Buhi... buhi, Serena-chan...
\n< Serena >Lord Gekuran.
\n< Serena >There should be a request addressed to me.

\n< Gekuran >Buhi... Indeed, there is a request addressed to
you... but why... buhi...

\n< Gekuran >W-Well, honestly, I don't think this kind of
request is suitable for Serena-chan...
buhi.
\n< Serena >It doesn't matter. Kinuko is here now.
\n< Gekuran >...Buhi... Buhihi...

\n< Gekuran >Buhi... This is a dark request from the
guild... Even the previous requests
weren't necessarily righteous jobs, but
still... buhi.

\n< Gekuran >This is no longer that kind of thing.
Buhi... It's something much deeper,
something not good.

\n< Gekuran >Buhi, the reward is certainly big. 10,000 S.
But in exchange, you'll be tightly bound
by the rules, you know.

\n< Gekuran >These are the rules. It's written in a
confusing way, but... in short, if the
request fails, the recipient will be
charged a penalty fee, buhihi...

\n< Gekuran >Buhi, in the worst case scenario, it's one
million S... It's an astronomical
number. Buhi. It's not an amount that
can be handled by an individual...

\n< Gekuran >...In this case, the guild will give up, fugo
fugo. We won't be able to expect any
recovery even if we give you a normal
job anymore...

\n< Gekuran >So, you'll be kidnapped and your freedom
will be taken away. You won't be a free
person anymore... buhi...

\n< Gekuran >If it comes to that, it's... the end of
your life...

\n< Gekuran >Serena-chan, no matter how much money you need, you
shouldn't take on a job like this. Buhi.

\n< Gekuran >Cancelling a designated request will certainly
result in a bad evaluation, but I'll do
my best to handle it from my side...

\n< Gekuran >Right? Let's do more normal jobs... and
steadily earn money, you know? Buhihi.

\n< Gekuran >We finally became close, but... something
like this... buhi...
\n< Gekuran >Your belly is also so big... buhihi...

\n< Gekuran >Even the baby would be in trouble... buhi.
If the mother were to get caught...
\n< Serena >...No, it's fine. I'll take on this request.
\n< Gekuran >What!? Buhi!

\n< Serena >I understand the risks. However, that
would only be if I fail.
\n< Serena >If I succeed, there won't be any problem.

\n< Serena >In other words, it means there won't be
any problem for me.
\n< Gekuran >Buhi...
\n< Gekuran >S-Serena-chan.
\n< Serena >？

\n< Gekuran >Th-this kind of request, you're going to cancel
it after all, r-right?
\n< Serena >.......

\n< Serena >No, I'll take it. It's already decided.
Don't try to stop me, Gekuran-sama.
\n< Gekuran >B-Buhiya!

\n< Gekuran >I-It's not working... My hypnosis... Their
will is strong. It's much more intense
than usual...

\n< Gekuran >There's something more important than me....
Ugh......!
\n< Serena >Let's get the request certificate.
Receive the request certificate
Gekuran's condition
Receive the request form.
How is Lord Guesclin doing...?
\n< Gekuran >......I won't let you......
\n< Serena >Huh?

\n< Gekuran >I won't forgive... I won't forgive...
I... g-guh...!
\n< Gekuran >This job... it's not normal...
\n< Gekuran >Plotting behind my back...!

\n< Gekuran >Are you planning to go somewhere far
away...! To abandon me...!
\n< Serena >What...? What are you saying?
\n< Gekuran >I won't forgive... I won't forgive...!
\n< Gekuran >It's mine... all of it...!
\n< Serena >Lord Gekuran...?
\n< Gekuran >Serena-chan!
\n< Gekuran >Become mine!!!
終了
\n< Serena >...I am indebted to you, Lord Gekuran.
\n< Gekuran >S-Serena-chan. Please come back safely.

\n< Gekuran >There are still so many things I haven't
tried with you... things like that and
things like this... I have plenty,
plenty of them... hehe.
\n< Gekuran >Buhii... buhii...
\n< Serena >Well, will the demon or the snake appear...
終了

\n< Serena >What the...!?

Coward... You weakling! Come at me and I'll teach
you a lesson about your place!
\n< Serena >Ugh...
\n< Serena >.......
\n< Serena >This town...

\n< Serena >No, let's not think about unnecessary
things for now. After all, this is not a
place to stay for long.

\n< Serena >...The meeting place was at the table in the
back.

\n< Serena >Find out where she is... Rescue her...
Return to the mansion... It's almost
time...

\n< Serena >We've wasted quite a bit of time getting
here.

\n< Serena >Splendore... Just wait a little longer. Please be
safe...

\n< Serena >...Don't be impatient... Did I come too
early...? It was the first thing in the
morning...
\n< Serena >.......

\n< Serena >Isn't this a bit too late... It's already
past noon...

\n< Serena >Damn it... I should have asked about the
informant's whereabouts. I don't even
know where to contact them from here...
\n< Serena >.......
\n< ？？？ >Hey, can I talk to you for a moment...
\n< Serena >Something...?

\n< ？？？ >Are you waiting for someone? You've been
there since morning, right?
\n< Serena >......I think they'll be able to come soon....

\n< ？？？ >They're not coming. You already know that,
right? Buhii.
\n< Serena >.......

\n< ？？？ >Being an adventurer is a personal
responsibility, you know. Normally, no
matter what happens to someone, they're
just left to their own devices...

\n< ？？？ >Hey, I can't stand seeing you so pitiful...
Buhii buhii...
\n< Serena >...Pitiful, huh.

\n< ？？？ >Approaching a troubled child, taking their money
and then leaving them behind.

\n< ？？？ >It's common for people like you, you know.
Normally, everyone would quickly notice
and get angry or frustrated...

\n< ？？？ >I've been believing in you all this time, so
I'm waiting here... buhi...

\n< Serena >The informant I hired... was just a scam
artist...?

\n< ？？？ >That's why I think you're being stood up like
this. Buhii buhii.
\n< Serena >......However, what should I do from now on?

\n< Serena >I... have already spent 250G... 25,000
silver as investigation expenses...
\n< ？？？ >Well, I made quite a profit from you, huh...

\n< Serena >I borrowed money to make up for what I
didn't have... And now, I have a debt of
5000 silver...

\n< Serena >If it's because they'll find out soon and
it'll be over... then I don't mind
having some debt... That's what I
thought...
\n< Serena >What should I do from now on...

\n< ？？？ >Buhii buhii. This is the Adventurer's Guild,
you know.

\n< ？？？ >If you're in need of money, then why don't
you work? That's the only thing I can
say to you... buhi.

\n< Serena >Work... work, huh... Coming this far, and
now...

\n< Serena >Every minute and every second is precious...
And yet, now... still...

\n< ？？？ >Whether you're a newcomer or not, that's how
you receive the baptism of this town,
huh... buhi.

\n< ？？？ >This place, you know, is a town where you
can hardly expect any goodwill from
people.
\n< ？？？ >Welcome. To the fortress city of Castorum.
\n< ？？？ >Buhii!

\n< Serena >...So, Lord Gekuran.
\n< Gekuran >What?! Serena-chan!
\n< Serena >Hmm...

\n< Serena >......I think you're right. There's no use
lamenting over it.

\n< Serena >For now, I need to get back on track.
That's why I want to take on some work.

\n< Gekuran >Yeah, that's right. But it's already past
noon, you know? Most of the safe and
profitable requests have already been
taken...

\n< Serena >I don't mind even if it's a bit rough. I
have confidence in my skills, after all.

\n< Gekuran >Buhii... Rough work, huh? Well, there's only one
request left for that.
\n< Serena >What kind of request is it?

\n< Gekuran >I guess it means cooperating in a decoy
investigation. Buhii.
\n< Serena >Hmmm.

\n< Gekuran >Buhiihi. The reward is 200S, but I don't really
recommend it, you know.
\n< Serena >Why?

\n< Gekuran >Buhii! That was cute just now! Do that Why?
thing again!
\n< Serena >I'm disgusted.
\n< Gekuran >B-Buhii...

\n< Gekuran >Well, the patrol team and the guild have a
delicate relationship, you know.

\n< Serena >Both of them are organizations that maintain
public order. In a way, they are
comrades, aren't they?

\n< Gekuran >Buhiihi. That means we're basically living off
the same food, huh?

\n< Serena >So there's a territorial dispute... not
much different from animals.
\n< Gekuran >It's not that simple, you know. Buhii.

\n< Serena >Well, I don't intend to stay in this town
long enough to have to worry about my
own position.

\n< Serena >In other words, it's just a request for
me. Fine. I'll take on that job.

\n< Gekuran >Buhii. Well, if you say so, I won't stop you.
Here's the request document.

\n< Gekuran >The patrol team's building is located in
the southwest of the town. It's marked
by a red roof. Make sure not to get
lost, okay?
\n< Serena >Hmm.
\n< Gekuran >Buhii.
\n< Serena >U...
\n< ？？？ >U... Ah... Uwaa... I don't like it... No...

\n< Serena >I see... It's rather disheartening to
suddenly have my spirits dampened...
It's not something that feels pleasant
to witness, after all...

\n< Serena >The patrol team's office is in the
southwest of the town... I should hurry
and head there...
